description:
Keep your sunnies right where you want them, with this silicone retainer from Cablz.

  • Stretchy silicone construction
  • Silicone will not absorb moisture, making these great on, or around water, and in humid environments
  • Retainer ends stretch to fit most sunglasses
  • Installation tip, dip the retainer end in rubbing alcohol, slip on your sunglass’s temples and wipe off and any excess alcohol with a damp cloth
name: Cablz Silicone Eyewear Retainer
